ygData.subject: Re: Stein Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: uh, no they took care of that abuse long ago, or didn t you know that monsters can run through walls if need be. They also can see through walls and thus can
ygData.messageBody:
uh, no they took care of that "abuse" long ago, or didn't you know that
monsters can run through walls if need be. They also can see through
walls and thus can cast at you through them, not to mention that if they
do get "stuck" they now teleport to you.
/Nos

"Fooks, Josh" wrote:
>
> From: "Fooks, Josh" <josh.fooks@...>
>
> The problem that everyone is having with casting Alliance is related to
> Line-of-Sight. They added some code a ways back to keep casters from
> abusing
> quick xp gains from monsters inside buildings and on the other side of
> walls. The counter is in the way and EQ thinks it's a wall so you won't be
> able to cast from the
>
> side opposite him unless you stand on the counter or get on the same side as
> him.
>
>
